entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
